name: Scrollbar buttons at top (Reverse OSX/Safari)
description:
Moves the scrollbar buttons in firefox to the top instead of top and bottom like MAC OSX but reversed.

----------------------------------------
OTHER SCROLLBAR MODS

Scrollbar buttons at bottom (like OSX) - http://userstyles.org/styles/25537 
Extra scrollbar button at bottom - http://userstyles.org/styles/25539
Remove scrollbar buttons - http://userstyles.org/styles/25540
